entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a person who was attacked by Krum. He is lying on the ground, twitching and jerking.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person who attacked Cedric from behind with his wand. He was stopped by Harry's spell.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who saved Cedric from Krum's attack. He cast the 'Stupefy' spell on Krum.

relationships.description: Harry attacked Krum with his wand, casting the 'Stupefy' spell on him.
Krum attacked Cedric from behind with his wand.
